member.name: T:SaatchiDataCapture.FunctionApp.Infrastructure.FunctionLogicHarness
member.summary: Provides common error handling and provisions for dependency injection for all functions.

Performs 6 common actions for all function entry points: 1) Initialises and creates an instance of via the container, providing an entry point to the logic library. 2) Deserialises the request body into a instance. 3) Validates the root of the deserialised instance. 4) Validates the rest of the instance via . 5) Wraps in a try catch, providing global error handling across all functions. In every instance, if an unhandled/unexpected exception is thrown, then a 500 will be returned, and the exception logged via the provided . 6) Provides the .
member.param: Additional validation logic beyond the immediate route of the provided instance of .
The service invocation logic, accepting an instance of type and the deserialised instance. Returns a depending on expected outcomes.

member.name: P:SaatchiDataCapture.FunctionApp.Models.UpdatePersonBody.ContactDetail.UpdateEmailVerificationCompletion
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to update . Note: This is required, as valid values for are either null (to indicate that the email address has not been verified) or a (when the email address was verified). If is simply not specified, but already has a value in the database, then this value would be overwritten with null. Therefore, this switch should be specified to force an update of the underlying data. Not set to nullable, as if not specified, this property will be set to false, which is a good default behaviour to go by!
